item.title: Kubernetes Deployment
item.description: Deployment 结构 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 type Deployment struct { metav1.TypeMeta `json:",inline"` metav1.ObjectMeta `json:"metadata,omitempty" protobuf:"bytes,1,opt,name=metadata"` Spec DeploymentSpec `json:"spec,omitempty" protobuf:"bytes,2,opt,name=spec"` Status DeploymentStatus `json:"status,omitempty" protobuf:"bytes,3,opt,name=status"` }
